name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Albert BUTLER, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Albert BUTLER, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 27th day of March, 2001, the Petition for Alowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, limited to the following issue:
Did the Superior Court err in affirming the denial of Petitioner’s PCRA petition when it deemed all of Petitioner’s issues waived due to counsel’s failure to file a Statement of Matters Complained of on Appeal pursuant to Pa.R.Crim.P. 1925(b)?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Albert BUTLER, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 27, 2001.
